column2: xpath_optical <-  '//*[contains(concat( " ", @class, " " ), concat( " ", "condition-rating", " " )) and (((count(preceding-sibling::*) + 1) = 2) and parent::*)]//*[contains(concat( " ", @class, " " ), concat( " ", "condition-description", " " ))]'
